long_description: The Merrell Range Duffel is solid, rugged and sophisticated all at once, with the proven functionality of a classic design. Made from polyester with a durable, water-resistant tarpaulin bottom fabric; leather trim and aluminum hardware add polished style. Features rugged haul handles and safety-belt quality webbing throughout; adjustable shoulder strap detaches and conveniently stows away. The Merrell Range Duffel features a large, zip-secure exterior cargo pocket. Zip-secure mesh organizer pocket and 3 stash pockets all with a bound finish organize your belongings. Oversize main compartment includes a zipper closure; secure any load with the 4-point compression strap system. Closeout.
short_description: The Merrell Range Duffel is solid, rugged and sophisticated all at once, with the proven functionality of a classic design.
